#text=The other day I decided that I wanted to read a book , but all the ones I had in my home I had read already .
#text=When I was thinking about what to do , I spotted my library card and decided that i 'd go borrow a book .
#text=I 've always liked libraries , they 're usually nice and quiet and you never know what kind of interesting books you might find when you 're looking around .
#text=I started by looking at the new arrival shelves , but nothing there really caught my eye .
#text=I headed over to one of the library computers and brought up the book search .
#text=It took me a little while to decide what kind of book I wanted , but eventually decided I wanted a science fiction book , just something to enjoy for a little while .
#text=I started browsing through all the search results until a book caught my eye .
#text=I noted down the shelf number it should be in and went over to it .
#text=I found my book and took it to the desk , where I gave the librarian my library card and the book .
#text=He checked it out for me and handed them back .
#text=After that , I headed home and sat down to read my book .
